tweets.text: @EnvAgencyMids Is it true that the site has unsegregated cells of gypsum and biodegradable waste producing numerous hydrogen sulphide hot spots? How was this allowed to happen? @RedIndustries2 @WalleysQuarry @NewsNBC @AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency #StopTheStink
Friday night was on of the worst ever. We’ve had the worst two weeks of fumes ever @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice @MattHancock #stopthestink https://t.co/3MTMF7AgD4

tweets.text:
Our officers have been out & about this weekend further to reports of odour from #WalleysQuarry #NewcastleUnderLyme 
 
We detected odour at numerous locations & last week issued the operator with further actions to improve its management of landfill gas as quickly as possible. https://t.co/zoXM4W2yrW

No root cause so how do you know how to fix it @EnvAgency ? I can tell you one thing - the solution is NOT to add more rubbish to the festering pile! @DefraGovUK @JamesBevanEA #stopthestink @MPGeorgeEustice @MattHancock https://t.co/Fg6M6kwAQ3

tweets.text: @SOPH_C_ This isn't good enough. This operation needs closing down.
@SOPH_C_ @ClareNicklin Out of control - How many complaints since the capping work on Cell 1 @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency it’s shameful #ripnewcastleunderlyme #stopthesstink https://t.co/yOcspOQPbq

Protesting ⁦@WalleysQuarry⁩ operated by ⁦@RedIndustries2⁩ for our right to clean air. Leaving for work feeling nauseous with a sore throat & it’s not even a bad day today for the fumes! ⁦@EnvAgency⁩ #stopthestink ⁦@DefraGovUK⁩ ⁦ https://t.co/VnwsaT4ipz
Statement from Red Industries. https://t.co/YhKIKpsPI7

@EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @VeoliaUK Protect? Working with companies? failure after failure- What is your purpose? What do you do? How many 1000’s of complaints have there been this weekend over @RedIndustries2 #Stopthestink @StinkStopthe https://t.co/FBlUJ0nBaC

You may be dodging 🌦️ showers if you're going outside for a breath of fresh air on your lunch break 🌂

tweets.text: @SwanwatchUk @EnvAgencySW @ExeterCouncil https://t.co/173Y0uYRUl

Reducing elevated #nitrate in #groundwater is a major challenge @EnvAgency has developed the ‘Nitrate Leaching Tool’ estimating annual losses at field & farm scale using data provided by farmers. NTL will help identify more sustainable farming practices that prevent pollution 1/3 https://t.co/zh9iyJBpAi

@davemh72 @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @StinkStopthe There you go @EnvAgency we did your PR job for you but a lot more honestly. Oh and @ClareDinnisEA we still haven't heard back from you with an answer to the news presenters question of 'would you live here?' did you think we'd forgotten? 
@StinkStopthe

@SianieRoo @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @AaronBell4NUL @PHE_WestMids Look at the image & compare it to what we have today, from ground surveys they have picked up hot spots of hydrogen sulphide in cells 3 and 4, from my research this has become a major problem,  that's why it's out of control along with poor management & the EA who did not listen!

Find out about our work with #Portsmouth City Council, aka @portsmouthtoday, on how to protect #Farlington Marshes from flooding.

The nature reserve is home to everything from bearded tits to owls and cattle. 

READ on and register for updates: https://t.co/5rAGwtVr3m
☔️🐦🦉🐄 https://t.co/kYEImdV1gM
@Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK #stopthestink @MPGeorgeEustice https://t.co/Q3NSevupm3

Glad some of the children (&adults with health conditions) are getting air purifiers donated by local businesses&the community themselves. Someone has a heart at least ❤️ @WalleysQuarry @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @MattHancock #stopthestink @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice https://t.co/xK0mnCkRFu

urls.title: Communicating the importance of natural flood management to a global audience - Natural Course
urls.description: US Army Engineer Research and Development Centre host virtual book launch for Engineering with Nature: An Atlas, Volume 2 Book features a Natural Course supported case study about natural flood management initiatives at Smithills and Low Leighton (New Mills) A case study showing the benefits of natural flood management interventions installed at the Smithills site […]

tweets.text: Thanks @SimonTagg - can we see some hard bargaining with strict timelines & holding the @EnvAgency to account. Would also like to hear if @MPGeorgeEustice responded to your request for a public enquiry into the regulators mismanagement of the disaster @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/kBNQW6hBfd

This has to STOP! Mark my words -someone is going to suffer serious harm or worse here,this is not a joke,an exaggeration.We are not bored housewives picking a fight.This is our lives, our kids lives & our health @Cap_it_off #stopthestink @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland https://t.co/c9zXFNsTF1

Coarse #fishing is illegal in the Thames until 15 June. This person in Fulham was using Sainsbury’s Large King Prawns to presumably catch eels so can’t exactly be starving! When challenged she said “no understand” & just continued 🙄 @EnvAgency #minimiseourhumanfootprint #fishing https://t.co/ylJBKlL88r

tweets.text:
England is at risk of facing #WaterShortages by 2050 due to #ClimateChange and population growth.

We're working with water companies to tackle this challenge and protect our water supplies.

Find out how: https://t.co/3OsurzkVGO https://t.co/Lu2mHFgV6F

Just reported this foam to @EnvAgency appeared in streams running from #WestPennineMoors  into #Wayoh & #Jumbles Res's. Seen it before but does anyone know, is it pollution? Or some natural process? @RibbleTrust @CanalRiverTrust @theriverstrust https://t.co/Z21UYT4sfh
@EnvAgency We agree... fishing is a brilliant way to unwind! 🎣 Any top tips for new fishers, @CRTFisheries? 🤔

Congratulations to our @AnaNMijic on publishing the report 'A systems-based approach to catchment water management' with thanks to @EnvAgency & @RAEngNews for the support. If you want to know more about #systems #Engineering & water management read it here https://t.co/NePKdgaKGC https://t.co/DYOGonozEw
Pleased to announce our successful exit of ReBOUND Returns. We backed the business in 2018 and have seen sales increase by 130% since our investment https://t.co/5sNZHMM8jc
